::: single-wrapper
```{ojs}

viewof singleButton = Inputs.button("Single button");

restyle = {
 const mib = viewof singleButton.querySelector('button.btn.btn-quarto');
 if (mib) {
    mib.classList.remove('btn-quarto');
    mib.classList.add('btn-primary');
  }
};

```
:::
